lasair_producer (class) ∞

class lasair_producer(host, username, password, topic_out)[source] ∞

Bases: object

Creates a Kafka producer for Lasair annotations

Methods

flush()

Finish an annotation session and close the producer If not called, your annotations will not go through!

produce(objectId, classification[, version, …])

Send an annotation to Lasair args: objectId : the object that this annotation should be attached to classification: short string for the classification version : the version of the annotation engine explanation : natural language explanation classdict : dictionary with further information
flush()[source] ∞

Finish an annotation session and close the producer If not called, your annotations will not go through!

produce(objectId, classification, version=None, explanation=None, classdict=None, url=None)[source] ∞

Send an annotation to Lasair args:

objectId : the object that this annotation should be attached to classification: short string for the classification version : the version of the annotation engine explanation : natural language explanation classdict : dictionary with further information
